input_args.passage: "David Wells' perfect game | On May 17, 1998, David Wells of the New York Yankees pitched the 15th perfect game in Major League Baseball history and the second in team history."
input_args.claim: "So, based on the information available, the pitcher who had a perfect game in 1998 was David Wells, but we can't confirm from the provided context that it was against Paul Molitor's team."
